abstract: Amazon.com has led a first-round venture investment in AmieStreet.com, an online music store with a social-networking twist. AmieStreet, which is less than a year old, sets the price for downloads according to a song’s popularity and allows users to rack up credits by recommending songs to their friends. The size of the funding round was not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com has led a first-round venture investment in AmieStreet.com, an online music store with a social-networking twist. AmieStreet, which is less than a year old, sets the price for downloads according to a song’s popularity and allows users to rack up credits by recommending songs to their friends. The size of the funding round was not disclosed.

headline.main: Amazon Invests in Music Download Site
